overview: Founder and COO of Nomadesk. Peter studied applied Information and Communication Technology at the Hoge School in Ghent, where he obtained a Bachelor Degree. He has both a practical and theoretical background in software engineering, project management, IT service management and quality assurance. His expertise is foremost concentrated on the design and implementation of IT Service Management and Operations, both with respect to procedural and organisational frameworks. Peter is an IT specialist who understands the added value of IT products and services to modern businesses and the role IT plays in the business environment.
